Module com.narayanjoshi.gplapplication
Package com.narayanjoshi.gplapplication

Class CanvasUtil

java.lang.Object
com.narayanjoshi.gplapplication.CanvasUtil
public class CanvasUtil extends Object
The CanvasUtil class represents all instance of canvas and hold all type of data necessary for canvas and display work.
Since:
v1.0
Author:
Narayan Joshi

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    protected static javafx.scene.canvas.Canvas
    canvasId
    This will hold the Canvas instance for processing.
    protected javafx.scene.canvas.GraphicsContext
    graphicsContext
    This will hold graphicsContext of canvas to perform draw operation of shapes.
